cb_fund.name: Fund
cb_fund.description_html: The fund that spent money on public cloud services. Money is deposited into a fund from which it is dispersed to cloud provider accounts to cover charges for usage.

attribute_filter_map_query.fund_id: SELECT fund_id FROM modw_public_cloud.funds WHERE fund_id IN (__filter_values__)

cb_fund.attribute_description_query: SELECT DISTINCT title AS filter_name FROM modw_public_cloud.funds WHERE fund_id IN (__filter_values__) ORDER BY title

cb_funder.name: Funding Source
cb_funder.description_html: The funding source that awarded the fund(s) that spent money on public cloud services.

attribute_filter_map_query.funder_id: SELECT funder_id FROM modw_public_cloud.funders WHERE funder_id IN (__filter_values__)

cb_funder.attribute_description_query: SELECT DISTINCT name AS filter_name FROM modw_public_cloud.funders WHERE funder_id IN (__filter_values__) ORDER BY name

cb_pi.name: Fund PI
cb_pi.description_html: The principal investigator on the fund(s) that spent money on public cloud services.

attribute_filter_map_query.pi_person_id: SELECT person_id FROM modw_public_cloud.persons WHERE person_id IN (__filter_values__)

cb_pi.attribute_description_query: SELECT DISTINCT full_name AS filter_name FROM modw_public_cloud.persons WHERE person_id IN (__filter_values__) ORDER BY full_name

cb_pi_institution.name: Fund PI Institution
cb_pi_institution.description_html: The primary institution of the principal investigator(s) on the fund(s) that spent money on public cloud services.

attribute_filter_map_query.pi_institution_id: SELECT institution_id FROM modw_public_cloud.institutions WHERE institution_id IN (__filter_values__)

cb_pi_institution.attribute_description_query: SELECT DISTINCT name AS filter_name FROM modw_public_cloud.institutions WHERE institution_id IN (__filter_values__) ORDER BY name

cb_pi_institution_carnegie_classificatio.name: Fund PI Institution Carnegie Classification
cb_pi_institution_carnegie_classificatio.description_html: The Carnegie Classification for the primary institution(s) of the principal investigator(s) on the fund(s) that spent money on public cloud services.

attribute_filter_map_query.pi_institution_carnegie_classification_i: SELECT carnegie_classification_id FROM modw_public_cloud.carnegie_classifications WHERE carnegie_classification_id IN (__filter_values__)

cb_pi_institution_carnegie_classificatio.attribute_description_query: SELECT DISTINCT display AS filter_name FROM modw_public_cloud.carnegie_classifications WHERE carnegie_classification_id IN (__filter_values__) ORDER BY name

cb_pi_institution_carnegie_research_desi.name: Fund PI Institution Carnegie Research Activity Designation
cb_pi_institution_carnegie_research_desi.description_html: The Carnegie Research Activity Designation for the primary institution(s) of the principal investigator(s) on the fund(s) that spent money on public cloud services.

attribute_filter_map_query.pi_institution_carnegie_research_designa: SELECT carnegie_research_designation_id FROM modw_public_cloud.carnegie_research_designations WHERE carnegie_research_designation_id IN (__filter_values__)

cb_pi_institution_carnegie_research_desi.attribute_description_query: SELECT DISTINCT display AS filter_name FROM modw_public_cloud.carnegie_research_designations WHERE carnegie_research_designation_id IN (__filter_values__) ORDER BY name

cb_pi_institution_epscor.name: Fund PI Institution EPSCoR
cb_pi_institution_epscor.description_html: Whether the primary institution(s) of the principal investigator(s) on the fund(s) that spent money on public cloud services are in an EPSCoR jurisdiction.

attribute_filter_map_query.pi_institution_epscor_id: SELECT epscor_id FROM modw_public_cloud.epscor WHERE epscor_id IN (__filter_values__)

cb_pi_institution_epscor.attribute_description_query: SELECT DISTINCT display AS filter_name FROM modw_public_cloud.epscor WHERE epscor_id IN (__filter_values__) ORDER BY name

cb_pi_institution_city.name: Fund PI Institution City
cb_pi_institution_city.description_html: The city in which the primary institution(s) of the principal investigator(s) on the fund(s) that spent money on public cloud services are located.

attribute_filter_map_query.pi_institution_epscor_id: SELECT city_id FROM modw_public_cloud.cities WHERE city_id IN (__filter_values__)

cb_pi_institution_city.attribute_description_query: SELECT DISTINCT display AS filter_name FROM modw_public_cloud.cities WHERE city_id IN (__filter_values__) ORDER BY name

cb_pi_institution_state.name: Fund PI Institution State
cb_pi_institution_state.description_html: The state in which the primary institution(s) of the principal investigator(s) on the fund(s) that spent money on public cloud services are located.

attribute_filter_map_query.pi_institution_state_id: SELECT state_id FROM modw_public_cloud.states WHERE state_id IN (__filter_values__)

cb_pi_institution_state.attribute_description_query: SELECT DISTINCT display AS filter_name FROM modw_public_cloud.states WHERE state_id IN (__filter_values__) ORDER BY name

cb_pi_institution_country.name: Fund PI Institution Country
cb_pi_institution_country.description_html: The country in which the primary institution(s) of the principal investigator(s) on the fund(s) that spent money on public cloud services are located.

attribute_filter_map_query.pi_institution_country_id: SELECT country_id FROM modw_public_cloud.countries WHERE country_id IN (__filter_values__)

cb_pi_institution_country.attribute_description_query: SELECT DISTINCT display AS filter_name FROM modw_public_cloud.countries WHERE country_id IN (__filter_values__) ORDER BY name

cb_nsf_directorate.name: Funding Source Directorate
cb_nsf_directorate.description_html: The NSF Directorate that awarded the fund(s) that spent money on public cloud services. For non-NSF funding sources, this value will be. For non-NSF funding sources, this value will be "Unknown".

attribute_filter_map_query.nsf_directorate_id: SELECT nsf_directorate_id FROM modw_public_cloud.nsf_directorates WHERE nsf_directorate_id IN (__filter_values__)

cb_nsf_directorate.attribute_description_query: SELECT DISTINCT full_name AS filter_name FROM modw_public_cloud.nsf_directorates WHERE nsf_directorate_id IN (__filter_values__) ORDER BY name

cb_nsf_division.name: Funding Source Division
cb_nsf_division.description_html: The NSF Division that awarded the fund(s) that spent money on public cloud services. For non-NSF funding sources, this value will be "Unknown."

attribute_filter_map_query.nsf_division_id: SELECT nsf_division_id FROM modw_public_cloud.nsf_divisions WHERE nsf_division_id IN (__filter_values__)

cb_nsf_division.attribute_description_query: SELECT DISTINCT full_name AS filter_name FROM modw_public_cloud.nsf_divisions WHERE nsf_division_id IN (__filter_values__) ORDER BY name

cb_field_of_science.name: Field of Science
cb_field_of_science.description_html: The branch of science under which a fund's research falls.

attribute_filter_map_query.field_of_science_id: SELECT field_of_science_id FROM modw_public_cloud.fields_of_science WHERE field_of_science_id IN (__filter_values__)

cb_field_of_science.attribute_description_query: SELECT DISTINCT full_name AS filter_name FROM modw_public_cloud.fields_of_science WHERE field_of_science_id IN (__filter_values__) ORDER BY full_name

cb_nairrproject.name: NAIRR Project
cb_nairrproject.description_html: The NAIRR Project associated with the cloudbank fund.

attribute_filter_map_query.fund_id: SELECT fund_id FROM modw_public_cloud.funds WHERE fund_id IN (__filter_values__)

cb_nairrproject.attribute_description_query: SELECT DISTINCT project_id AS filter_name FROM modw_public_cloud.funds WHERE fund_id IN (__filter_values__) ORDER BY title
